import { useState } from "react"; const EditProduct = () => { const [imageProd, setImageProd] = useState('/img/img-not-found.png') const imgPreviewProd = (e) => { let reader = new FileReader() reader.onloadend = () => { setImageProd(reader.result); } if (e.target.files[0]){ reader.readAsDataURL(e.target.files[0]); }else{ setImageProd(''); } } return( <>

Categoría * Precio * Descuento * Descripción * Link Mercado Pago * Empresa * Localidad * Envíos *
) } export default EditProduct;
